meanings.definition: Teevees (noun): plural form of teevee, meaning television sets.
meanings.sent1: We have two teevees in our living room.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various teevees at affordable prices.
meanings.sent3: The teevees in the store were all showing different channels, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The teevees in the electronics store seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The bright screens of the teevees lit up the room like fireworks.

meanings.definition: Teevees (verb): third person singular present form of teevee, meaning to watch television.
meanings.sent1: She teevees every night before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: He teevees his favorite show on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat teevees the fish tank, hoping for some entertainment.
meanings.sent4: The students teevees the documentary with great interest.
meanings.sent5: The family teevees together, enjoying quality time.

meanings.definition: Teevees (adjective): describing something related to television.
meanings.sent1: The teevees industry is constantly evolving.
meanings.sent2: She works in the teevees production company.
meanings.sent3: The teevees awards show was a glamorous event.
meanings.sent4: His teevees collection is impressive, with rare memorabilia.
meanings.sent5: The teevees studio was buzzing with activity during the live broadcast.
